subject: Dear Lida
body:
Dear Lida

Good day . We are in receipt of your mail  dated  4Th  Feb   2024 and we
have taken note of your mail ,before we sign the MoU  you need to indicate
 your  clients business plan and  we are ready to finance all
their  projects .

Sir, our Deal sizes up to $100.000:00 Minimum Funding --- $500,000,000
Maximum Funding * Rates as low as 2% both home and
overseas. * 3-25 year terms * Broker friendly * Closing typically in under
7-14 workings day * for either personal or business loans,

Find attached  the company  Loan  Application  form. Go ahead  and  give it
to your client  to complete the form and send it back to us so that we will
be able to give you the loan calculation and our terms and conditions.
Including the loan repayment plan
.
I appreciate your genuineness as well
in your work with us. I would like to inform you that we do have incentives
for you for every successful client that meets our approval requirements.

We would approve a 5% finder's fee on every loan approved for payment as
your commission. We urge you to work with us so we can build a lasting
business relationship.

*Note* the Insurance Premium fee is always calculated on the total Loan
Fund your client requested  speciall;y when the client do not have
collateral security here in the United Kingdom ,

Yes you are free to increase the Interest rate But the least we can offer
you for now is 2%  What ever interest rate you add just indicate to us in
your next mail

As we progress with the loan application process  we will give you the
insurance company contact ,


Regards,

Mr Paul  McCann
Capital Funding One Limited
Cheshire House Gorsey Lane.
Widnes Cheshire
England  WA8 ORP UK
WHATApp  No +44 7407649394


Lida <qy69436@***.com>

to me




Dear CFO Limited UK,

Thank you for reaching out and Happy New Year to you too. I am interested
in your proposal to work as a loan officer. However, before we proceed, I
would like to know more about the nature of the job, the terms and
conditions, and the commission structure.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Lida

subject: Re: Dear Lida
body:
Dear Lida,

Thank you for your response and interest in our proposal. As a loan officer, your primary role would be to act as an intermediary between our company and potential clients seeking loans. 

Your responsibilities would include:

1. Evaluating and authorizing approval of business or credit loans.
2. Advising borrowers on financial status and methods of payments.
3. Meeting with applicants to obtain information for loan applications and to answer questions about the process.

In terms of remuneration, we offer a competitive commission structure based on the value of the loans you facilitate. For every successful loan approved, we offer a finder's fee which is calculated as a percentage of the total loan amount.

Please note that all transactions must adhere strictly to our company's policies and guidelines as well as regulatory requirements.

We look forward to working with you towards building lasting business relationships.

Best wishes,
Lida
